author: fwyzard
body:
Backport from the IB/CMSSW_7_2_X/gcc491 branch:
- update binutils and other packages for better support of debug symbols 

Backport #946 (support for debug symbols in scram projects):
- generate debug information
- relocate the source file information to a default directory (that GB can later remap)
- split and compress the debugging symbols
- package the debugging symbols in a separate sub-package

Needs https://github.com/cms-sw/pkgtools/pull/63 to be integrated before it can work.
title: fix the processing of debug symbols and the related subpackage functionality (stable)
